resources.string: Create a login. It is free and takes a minute. It allows you to save progress..!
Enough for you to walk around the bedroom, and to keep your feet warm, but not much else.
You can go out of the bedroom and take a walk. But you can go only as far as your feet can take you,and it is not too far!
Shoes and running are all good, but a bicycle will get you places faster and farther! But, you dont get to save the world
Mastered the bicycle. Proceed to the scooter. But whoever saved the world on scooter ?
You can edit your profile here!
This will reset all the settings to zero.All your progress will be lost.Use this only if you are certain about what you are doing!
We will be said to see you leave.Are you sure you can\'t stay a while longer?
